name: Kia Seltos
description: The price of Kia Seltos, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 10.90  - 20.35 Lakh. It is available in 26 variants, with engine options ranging from 1482 to 1497 cc and a choice of 3 transmissions: Manual, Automatic and Clutchless Manual (IMT). Seltos has an NCAP rating of 3 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Kia Seltos is available in 11 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17 to 20.7 kmpl for Seltos.
